title: Three or four-night luxury New York package
text: Telegraph readers are invited to fly to New York in style, on an exclusive three or four-night package in a choice of two excellent New York hotels. Stretch out in business class seats on luxury airline La Compagnie, before enjoying a private transfer to either opulent grand dame The Plaza hotel, where, according to our expert, “gilded Age opulence abounds” , or the sassy Conrad New York, which has a “a buzzing rooftop bar, an impressive art collection, comfy beds and spacious rooms.” A room at The Plaza, New York Three nights at The Plaza start from £1,799pp (four nights £2,049); three nights at Conrad New York from £1,499pp (£1,749). Both include flights from London Luton. Book by October 17 for selected dates between October 1 and March 31, 2016. Quote: “ FWE1909 ”; 0333 234 0499 ; or visit telegraph.co.uk/conradoffer for more information on the Conrad package; telegraph.co.uk/plazaoffer for more on The Plaza. Our expert says of La Compagnie: “There is something very special about a plane where everyone is in luxury class - it almost feels like a club, where everyone is in on the secret.” What's included •Accomodation in a deluxe suite at Conrad New York, or in a Plaza King room at The Plaza •Return business-class flights with checked-in luggage •Use of lounge at London Luton airport •Option of either a helicopter flight over New York or a horse-drawn carriage ride through Central Park. •Private car transfers to the hotel •Read the full reviews: Conrad New York , The Plaza Telegraphtravel Follow @telegraphtravel
